nodes.text: Nut butter was a type of butter made using nuts which could be served in cafés. The voice of an individual speaking with a mouthful of nut butter sounded muffled and sticky; when the Jedi Knight Luke Skywalker first met the Givin mathematician Drusil Bephorin after she had been sitting at a café on the planet Denon he wondered if her voice sounded muffled and sticky because she had consumed nut butter at the café.
Nut butter was first mentioned in the novel Heir to the Jedi, which was written by Kevin Hearne and released in 2014.
